Path::Class::Entity(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Path::Class::Entity(3)

NAME

Path::Class::Entity - Base class for files and directories

VERSION

version 0.33

DESCRIPTION

This class is the base class for "Path::Class::File" and "Path::Class::Dir", it is not used directly by callers.

AUTHOR

Ken Williams, kwilliams@cpan.org

SEE ALSO

Path::Class
2020-02-09 perl v5.18.2
